text: Gitanjali Rao (born 19 November 2005) is an American inventor. She won the Discovery Education 3M Young Scientist Challenge in 2017. She was honored as Forbes 30 U 30 for her innovations. She was named TIME Top young innovator in 2020 for her innovations and "innovation workshops" she conducts across the globe. In the December 2020 cover, Time named Rao the first "Kid of the Year". Rao was born in Lone Tree, Colorado. ==References== Category:American inventors Category:Scientists from Colorado Category:2005 births Category:Living people
title: Gitanjali Rao (scientist)
